author: admin
title: reIMAGINE 2015 Announces Keynote Panel
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Dynamic Communities, Inc. 
FARGO, N.D., Sept. 11, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- reIMAGINE 2015, a Microsoft DynamicsÂ® GP partner event, has announced the keynote panelists for this year's event being held September 21-23 in Fargo, North Dakota. True to the entrepreneurial spirit of Fargo, present-day pioneers will speak about overcoming obstacles and forging success in their own unique way. 
Included on the panel are Clint Howitz, Pack Leader, dogIDs, Max Kringen, Founder & CEO, Tellwell and Marketing Strategist, Myriad Mobile, Mark J. Lindquist, Motivational Speaker & Entertainer and Greg Tehven, Co-Founder, Students Today Leaders Forever and the Pay It Forward Tour. Each panelist will inspire the reIMAGINE attendees with their stories, insights and anecdotes that have propelled their business and shaped their success. 
"Fargo is the kind of place where people create, build and introduce new ideas," said Greg Tehven. "I am excited to be a Fargo evangelist, helping to tell the story and celebrate this amazing city. Knowing the connection with and history of Great Plains Software, it is gratifying to have the global Microsoft Dynamics GP partner community back to hear and learn from some of Fargo's successful business leaders and the paths they took to become a success story." 
"The reIMAGINE conference is about helping Dynamics GP partners to innovate and grow in today's market," said Janet Lampert, President and COO of Dynamic Communities, Inc. "We are fortunate to have a thriving business community in Fargo and the attendees, as well as Microsoft, are grateful to each of the business leaders who will share their success with us." 
About reIMAGINE: reIMAGINE is the annual Microsoft Dynamics GP Partner-focused conference taking place September 21-23, 2015 in Fargo, ND. This conference is the premier training event for Dynamics GP Partners in the following roles: sales, marketing, executive, development, and consulting. www.reIMAGINE2015.com 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/reimagine-2015-announces-keynote-panel-300141463.html 
SOURCE Dynamic Communities, Inc.
